definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Where has the bottle been all these years?
sentences.chinese: 漂流瓶這些年都去哪了？

sentences.english: A virtual floating bottle game is prevalent among young people in China on the Internet nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 漂流瓶遊戲在當今中國互聯網上的年輕人當中很流行。

sentences.english: Which way will this floating bottle go in the sea?
sentences.chinese: 不知道大海中這個漂流瓶將會漂向哪邊？

to seek new friends through personal ads, dating apps etc
The Moment of Truth (TV show)/Truth or Dare (game)
